sauces.name: Enchantress
sauces.review: Not bad, but not a lot of flavor

sauces.name: Honey Mustard
sauces.review: Like Zulu's Sauce but a bit sharper with more flavor

sauces.name: Ketchup
sauces.review: Decent, but boring compared to the other sauces

sauces.name: Mana Burn
sauces.review: Not a lot of flavor, bit too spicy

sauces.name: Tortle
sauces.review: Similar to guacamole, which is good, but kinda weird on tater tots

sauces.name: Worldfire
sauces.review: Spicy and vinegary, but if you're careful has some good kick to it

sauces.name: Zulu's Sauce
sauces.review: Good, like honey mustard but smoother
